00001   string print(map<string,Form*> in)
00002   {
00003     string out = "{\n";
00004     for(map<string,Form*>::iterator i = in.begin(); i != in.end(); i++)
00005     {
00006       out += "\t" + i->first + " : " + i->second + "\n";
00007     }
00008     return out + "}\n";
00009   }

00012   {
00013     cout << "Input:\n" << first << ", " << second << endl;
00014     cout << "Output:\n" << append(first,second) << endl;
00015   }

00017   void runTest_append()
00018   {
00019     cout << "Testing: (APPEND)" << endl;
00020     testAppend(readString("(derp)"),readString("(derp herp)"));
00021     testAppend(readString("(derp herp)"),readString("(durp hurp)"));
00022     testAppend(readString("(derp)"),readString("((derp herp))"));
00023   }

00025   void testEditForm(Form* code, map<string,Form*> replacements)
00026   {
00027     cout << "Original form:\n" << code << endl;
00028     cout << "Replacements:\n" << print(replacements) << endl;
00029     cout << "Final form:\n" << editForm(code,replacements) << endl;
00030   }
00031   
00032   void runTest_editForm()
00033   {
00034     cout << "Testing: Form Editing" << endl;
00035     map<string,Form*> replacements;
00036     replacements["A"] = readString("i32");
00037     replacements["B"] = readString("(sequence char)");
00038     replacements["C"] = readString("(matrix long)");
00039     testEditForm(readString("a"),replacements);
00040     cin.get();
00041     testEditForm(readString("A"),replacements);
00042     cin.get();
00043     testEditForm(readString("(A B)"),replacements);
00044     cin.get();
00045     testEditForm(readString("(sample A (derp B) (herp C hurp))"),replacements);
00046     testEditForm(readString("(inline i64 ((in (sequence Type))) (ret 1))"),replacements);
00047     cin.get();
00048   }

00074   void analyzeGeneric(Generic in)
00075   {
00076     cout << "   Generic type: " << (in.id ? "Function" : "Structure") << endl;
00077     cout << "   Generic code: " << in.code << endl;
00078     cout << "   Generic arguments: " << endl;
00079     unsigned long i = 0;
00080     for(; i < in.arguments.size(); i++)
00081     {
00082       cout << "      " << in.arguments[i] << " ";
00083     }
00084     cout << " \n   Generic specializations: " << endl;
00085     for(map<string,map<string, pair<long,string> > >::iterator seeker = in.specializations.begin();
00086         seeker != in.specializations.end(); seeker++)
00087     {
00088       cout << "      " << seeker->first << " ";
00089     }
00090     cout << "   Generic methods: " << endl;
00091     for(i = 0; i < in.methods.size(); i++)
00092     {
00093       cout << "      " << in.methods[i] << " ";
00094     }
00095     cout << endl;
00096   }
00097   
00098   void testMakeGeneric(Form* in)
00099   {
00100     cout << "Form: " << in << endl;
00101     Generic out = makeGeneric(in);
00102     analyzeGeneric(out);
00103   }
00104   
00105   void runTest_makeGeneric()
00106   {
00107     cout << "Testing: makeGeneric" << endl;
00108     testMakeGeneric(readString("(generic structure derp (a) (element a))"));
00109     testMakeGeneric(readString("(generic function durp (a b c) (function a (x y z) ...))"));
00110     testMakeGeneric(readString("(generic structure sequence (Type) (length i64) (data (pointer Type)))"));
00111     testMakeGeneric(readString("(generic method length of sequence (inline i64 ((in (sequence Type))) 10))"));
00112   }

00128     testPrintTypeSignature(readString("(derp i32)"));
00129     testPrintTypeSignature(readString("(derp i32*)"));

00131     cout << "Code Stack: " << endl;
00132     for(unsigned long i = 0; i < CodeStack.size(); i++)
00133     {
00134       cout << CodeStack[i] << endl;

00139   {

00142     for(unsigned long i = 0; i < length(test); i++)
00143     {
00144       cout << "Element " << i << ": " << nth(test,i) << endl;
00145     }*/
00146     //runTest_append();
00147     //runTest_editForm();
00148     //runTest_makeType();
00149     //runTest_makeStructure();
00150     //runTest_makeGeneric();
00151     //runTest_printTypeSignature();
00152     string out;
00153     string tests[] =
00154     {
00155       //Testing the language Core
00156       "10",
00157       "(add 10 20)",
00158       "(icmp eq 1 2)",
00159       "(icmp leq 10 100)",
00160       //Testing function definition
00161       "(function test i64 ()\
00162         10)",
00163       "(function derp i64 ((n i64))\
00164         10)",
00165       "(function test bool ((n i64) (m i64))\
00166         (icmp eq n m))",
00167       "(function test2 bool ()\
00168         (icmp eq 2 2))",      //Testing Function calling
00169       "(test)",
00170       "(test 2 3)",
00171       "(test2)",
00172       /*"(recursive fib i64 ((n i64))\
00173         (flow (icmp ult 2 n)\
00174           n\
00175             (add (fib (sub n 1))\
00176                  (fib (sub n 2)))))",*/
00177       "\0"
00178     };
00179     for(unsigned long i = 0; tests[i] != "\0"; i++)
00180     {
00181       out += "Test #" + to_string(i+1) + ":\n> " + tests[i] + "\n\n";
00182       out += emitCode(readString(tests[i])) + "\n\n";
00183       cout << out << endl;
00184       cin.get();
00185     }
00186   }
